organSystems.name: Digestive
organSystems.subtitle: PREBIOTICS, PROBIOTICS, POSTBIOTICS, ENZYMES
organSystems.description: A complete 4-tier digestive support system featuring 10 Billion CFU of probiotics and clinically proven enzymes to optimize nutrient absorption and gut health.

organSystems.name: Immune
organSystems.subtitle: VITAMIN C, D3, ZINC, ELDERBERRY
organSystems.description: Comprehensive immune support with clinically studied ingredients including Vitamin C, D3, Zinc, and Elderberry extract to strengthen your body's natural defenses.

organSystems.name: Cardiovascular
organSystems.subtitle: COQ10, OMEGA-3, RESVERATROL
organSystems.description: Heart-healthy nutrients including CoQ10, Omega-3 fatty acids, and Resveratrol to support cardiovascular function and healthy blood pressure.

organSystems.name: Muscular
organSystems.subtitle: BCAA, CREATINE, MAGNESIUM
organSystems.description: Support muscle recovery and strength with branched-chain amino acids, creatine, and magnesium for optimal physical performance.

organSystems.name: Skeletal
organSystems.subtitle: CALCIUM, VITAMIN D, K2
organSystems.description: Bone health support with calcium, Vitamin D3, and K2 working synergistically to maintain strong bones and healthy bone density.

organSystems.name: Integumentary
organSystems.subtitle: COLLAGEN, BIOTIN, HYALURONIC ACID
organSystems.description: Skin, hair, and nail support with collagen peptides, biotin, and hyaluronic acid for a radiant, youthful appearance.

organSystems.name: Nervous
organSystems.subtitle: LION'S MANE, GINKGO, B-VITAMINS
organSystems.description: Cognitive support with Lion's Mane mushroom, Ginkgo Biloba, and B-vitamins to enhance mental clarity, focus, and memory.

organSystems.name: Endocrine
organSystems.subtitle: ASHWAGANDHA, MACA, RHODIOLA
organSystems.description: Hormone balance support with adaptogenic herbs including Ashwagandha, Maca root, and Rhodiola for stress resilience and energy.

organSystems.name: Urinary
organSystems.subtitle: CRANBERRY, D-MANNOSE, NETTLE
organSystems.description: Urinary tract health support with cranberry extract, D-Mannose, and nettle leaf for optimal kidney and bladder function.
